TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapProtocolImporter extends System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter

Docs.summary: Generates classes for Web services that use the SOAP protocol.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class generates client proxy code or abstract server code according to the SOAP protocol. The class generates a class for each supported binding defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
Typically, instead of invoking <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> directly, a developer uses the class indirectly through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Protected Overrides Function BeginClass () As CodeTypeDeclaration

Docs.summary: Initializes the generation of a binding class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks During generation of a class for a given binding, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.BeginClass%2A> method executes before the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class generates methods that correspond to operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void BeginNamespace() cil managed

Docs.summary: Performs initialization for an entire code namespace during code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks During code generation, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.BeginNamespace%2A> method executes before the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class generates classes that represent bindings.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void EndClass() cil managed

Docs.summary: Processes a binding class after the generation of methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks During generation of a class for a given binding, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.EndClass%2A> method executes after the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class generates methods that correspond to operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void EndNamespace() cil managed

Docs.summary: Performs processing for an entire code namespace after binding class generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks During code generation, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.EndNamespace%2A> method executes after the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class generates classes that represent bindings.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod GenerateMethod() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GenerateMethod () As CodeMemberMethod

Docs.summary: Generates method code for a binding class.
Docs.returns: The method code for a binding class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks During generation of a class for a given binding, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.GenerateMethod%2A> method executes for each binding class method that represents an operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool IsBindingSupported() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function IsBindingSupported () As Boolean

Docs.summary: Determines whether a class can be generated for the current binding.
Docs.returns: if the class can be generated for the current binding; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.IsBindingSupported%2A> method determines whether to generate a class for the current binding, as represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.Binding%2A> property. The method checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.Binding%2A> property's <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding.Extensions%2A> property contains a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding> instance. In addition, the transport mechanism obtained through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding.Transport%2A> property must be supported by the current Web services configuration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool IsOperationFlowSupported(valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow flow) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function IsOperationFlowSupported (flow As OperationFlow) As Boolean

Docs.param: An enumeration value that represents a transmission pattern.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the current operation's operation flow is supported.
Docs.returns: if the current operation's operation flow is supported; otherwise .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.IsOperationFlowSupported%2A> method determines whether to generate a method for the current operation, as represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> property. This evaluation takes place for each operation in a binding for which a class is being generated. If a `false` value is returned, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.UnsupportedOperationWarning%2A> method executes. A `true` value is returned only if the input value is <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow.OneWay> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow.RequestResponse>.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection.Flow%2A> property. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.Messages%2A> property is of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection>.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SoapBinding As SoapBinding

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SoapExporter As SoapCodeExporter

Docs.summary: Gets the object of type used internally by the class to generate code from mappings between SOAP-encoded XML schema content and .NET Framework types.
Docs.value: An object of type used internally by the class to generate code from mappings between SOAP-encoded XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class uses a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> object to create code from .NET Framework type mappings for XML schema elements and data types that enable SOAP encoding, as opposed to literal XML Schema usage. SOAP encoding is specified in section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification. SOAP encoding uses the namespace "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/".

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SoapImporter As SoapSchemaImporter

Docs.summary: Gets the object of type used internally by the class to generate mappings between SOAP-encoded XML schema content and .NET Framework types.
Docs.value: An object of type used internally by the class to generate mappings between SOAP-encoded XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class uses a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaImporter> object to create .NET Framework type mappings for XML schema elements and data types that enable SOAP encoding, as opposed to literal XML Schema usage. SOAP encoding is specified in section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification. SOAP encoding uses the namespace "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/".

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XmlExporter As XmlCodeExporter

Docs.summary: Gets the object of type used internally by the class to generate code from mappings between literal XML schema content and .NET Framework types.
Docs.value: An object of type used internally by the class to generate code from mappings between literal XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class uses an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> object to create .NET Framework type mappings for XML schema elements and data types that require literal XML Schema usage, as opposed to SOAP encoding. SOAP encoding is specified in section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

Docs.value: An object of type used internally by the class to generate mappings between literal XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class uses an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> object to create code from .NET Framework type mappings for XML schema elements and data types that require literal XML Schema usage, as opposed to SOAP encoding. SOAP encoding is specified in section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
